channel.title: howtoprogrambetter.com
channel.description: Learn How To Program and become a Better Software Engineer with Alex Tamoykin

item.title: Test Driven Development with Xcode
item.author: Alex Tamoykin
item.description:
Test Driven Development is a great way to take your code to a whole another level. In this presentation, we’ll talk about what is TDD, why TDD is awesome and how to do it in Xcode using Swift and XCTest

Here is the link to a Video Recording

and Slides


Presented at CocoaHeads LA – Testing Edition

Enjoy,

Alex

item.title: Interview at Swift Coders Podcast
item.author: Alex Tamoykin
item.description:
We’re big proponents of Swift, Apple’s new programing language at The Right Balance. It’s exciting to see the Swift community evolving. It was great to speak at the opening podcast dedicated to Swift Development called Swift Coders. Kudos to Garric Nahapetian for putting it together.

Check out the first episode here, we hope that you really like it.
